subject: Re: TKC Websites | Updates
preview: Hi Rosemary,  Great news, we have set the order export on both BugZapper lamps and Sectarid.  Do you want to do some test submissions to make sure that the orders feed through?  Thanks and speak soon,

full_threads.body:
Hi Rosemary,

Great news, we have set the order export on both BugZapper lamps and Sectarid.

Do you want to do some test submissions to make sure that the orders feed through?

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au

Hi Heath,

Yes, happy to add the CSV export to sectarid and Bugzapper, configure and test.

WooCommerce details, sending you password separately.

User: websitesupport@mayohardware.com.au

Thanks,

Rosemary

Rosemary Murphy

Marketing Communications Manager





rmurphy@mayohardware.com.au



www.mayohardware.com.au



+61 400 329 380



Customer Service: 1300 360 211

We pride ourselves on the highest levels of service delivery, please feel free to contact me on any of the above methods, anytime.

Hi Rosemary,

We have investigated this on Thermacell and all looks straight forward.

If ok with you, let's add the CSV export to sectarid and Bugzapper, configure and test. There's very little risk as it's currently not operational of course.

All we need are your woocommerce logins and then we can get to work.

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body: @heath Would you be able to brief me with order export?

Hello,

In regards to the Order Export….

We need to set up the automation of order exports to our server. We currently use on our Thermacell website a plugin call WooCommerce Customer / Order / Coupon Export. https://woocommerce.com/products/ordercustomer-csv-export/ We export the orders daily as a CSV file. Happy to review if you have a better way to do this export of orders. We basically look to have the CSV file exporting onto our server, then Pronto collects the order and loads for us automatically. Please let me know, then we can work on what you need from us to get this set up completed. Attached is an example of the export and the fields we require for our automated loading to Pronto. It is extremely important that the fields export the same way every time with all fields in exactly the same order as the attached file across all 3 websites.

Please see attached the Export folder locations on our server, this is where the order CSV file needs to be exported to.

Thanks,

Rosemary

Rosemary Murphy

Marketing Communications Manager

attachments.filename: TKC_Website Pricing and product Updates_12th OCT.xlsx

full_threads.body:
Hi Rosemary, 

Great news, both sites are now hooked up to your PayPal account and the requested content and pricing changes have been made as specified in your PowerPoint and Excel file. 

Once we get Thermacell signed up we will take a look 'under the hood' and roll out the FTP integration to these two sites as well.

Hi Heath,

Apologies for the delay.

Looking to work through the final process of getting these websites back to being live for order placement.

Paypal setup

Please see below username, will send password alternative method

https://www.paypal.com/au/signin

User: hardwarear@mayogroup.com.au

Retail Updates and hiding of product pages (de-ranged)

We need to make some retail updates and also "hide" some product pages of items that are no longer in stock. Just looking to 'turn off' in backend at this stage, until the team have time to fully review all products. See attached list.

Page Updates

Please see attached updates required.

I noted that not all contact details have been updated, the footer at the bottom of every product page still has Kelly Company details, please make all footers the same as Home page updates.

Also wondering if it is possible to remove the buttons for instruction manual or brochure if there is nothing loaded in the backend. Example https://bugzapperlamps.com.au/product/71450/

Delete page https://bugzapperlamps.com.au/win-1-of-5-yard-guard-30-watt-bug-zappers/

Flat Rate for shipping

All shipping will have a flat rate of $15.00, all products

Order Export

We need to set up the automation of order exports to our server. We currently use on our Thermacell website a plugin call WooCommerce Customer / Order / Coupon Export. https://woocommerce.com/products/ordercustomer-csv-export/ We export the orders daily as a CSV file. Happy to review if you have a better way to do this export of orders. We basically look to have the CSV file exporting onto our server, then Pronto collects the order and loads for us automatically. Please let me know, then we can work on what you need from us to get this set up completed. Attached is an example of the export and the fields we require for our automated loading to Pronto.

Thanks,

Rosemary

Rosemary Murphy

Marketing Communications Manager





rmurphy@mayohardware.com.au



www.mayohardware.com.au



+61 400 329 380



Customer Service: 1300 360 211

We pride ourselves on the highest levels of service delivery, please feel free to contact me on any of the above methods, anytime.

attachments.filename: TKC_Website Pricing and product Updates_12th OCT.xlsx

full_threads.body:
Hi Rosemary, 

Thanks for sending through the updates. 

Confirming the changes from the PowerPoint file have all been made. Regarding the other changes:

  1. Noted
  2. PayPal is setup, I just need to your account connect this to the respective sites. Can you please send me the logins. For security, reply to this email with your username and SMS the password to my mobile 0415 162 271
  3. Noted, this IP address is going to change once we do the domain name updates, so let's hold on this until those are done
  4. Yes, customers and your nominated email address will receive an order confirmation. Reference screenshot attached for Sectarid. 
  5. Re shipping. On bugzapper, it's a flat rate charge of $10 if it's a globe or $15 if it's a bug zapper. IF you get one of each the most expensive shipping option applies. On Sectarid it's a flat $15 fee.
  6. Privacy policy link added to footer, contact form and check out form 

Once we have the PayPal details and that's all setup, I'm happy to give you tour/demo of the setup if you like?

@heath done with all the changes, kindly check thanks!

https://bugzapperlamps.com.au/contact/
https://bugzapperlamps.com.au/faqs/
https://bugzapperlamps.com.au/globe-replacement-instructions/
https://bugzapperlamps.com.au/privacy-policy/
https://www.sectarid.com.au/contact-us/
https://www.sectarid.com.au/privacy-policy/
